title: Google Pixl 3a UK version charger is not fitting not fitting standard UK wall socket.
content: Google Pixl 3a XL UK power adapter pins does not currently fit into standard UK wall socket. Is there a way to move these pins so that the adapter fits the standard UK wall socket? Saw a separate post suggesting that it was expandable, but itâ€™s not clear how to do this based on the information provided.
